actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the U. S. Postal Service may not require the installation of mailboxes at the curb line of residential property in certain localities.

summary.text: Provides that the United States Postal Service may not require the installation of mailboxes at the curb line of residential property in specified localities.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the U. S. Postal Service may not require the installation of mailboxes at the curb line of residential property in certain localities.
